description: Azure operator Nexus is a carrier grade hybrid cloud platform built for mission critical mobile network applications. It simplifies the provisioning of new network services and optimizes the deployment of network functions and applications into on premise data centers. This table collects the system & security logs of the baremetal machines.

tables.description: Syslog events on Nexus Baremetal Machines providing critical insights into system activities, errors and anomalies for effecient troubleshooting and monitoring.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.

columns.name: Node
columns.description: Host name of the Baremetal Machine.

columns.name: ProcessName
columns.description: Identification of the process generating the log.

columns.name: ProcessId
columns.description: ID of the process emitting the log.

columns.name: Message
columns.description: Syslog message generated by the Baremetal machine.

columns.name: Facility
columns.description: Log facility type. E.g. daemon, kern, syslog, user.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Severity of the log record. E.g. Info, Warning, Critical, Error, Notice, Debug.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Location of the Nexus Baremetal machine.

columns.name: ClusterManagerName
columns.description: Name of the ClusterManager managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of the on-prem Nexus cluster.

tables.description: Security audit log events on Nexus Baremetal Machines to monitor and detect user access to the system.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.

columns.name: Node
columns.description: Host name of the Baremetal Machine.

columns.name: ProcessName
columns.description: Identification of the process generating the log. E.g. audit.

columns.name: ProcessId
columns.description: ID of the process associated with the log (or 0 if not applicable).

columns.name: Message
columns.description: Syslog message generated by the Baremetal machine.

columns.name: Facility
columns.description: Log facility type. E.g. audit.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Severity of the log record. E.g. Info, Warning, Critical, Error, Notice, Debug.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Location of the Nexus Baremetal machine.

columns.name: ClusterManagerName
columns.description: Name of the ClusterManager managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of the on-prem Nexus cluster.

tables.description: Security log events on Nexus Baremetal Machines to monitor and detect user access to the system.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.

columns.name: ContainerName
columns.description: Name of the container generating the log for the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: NamespaceName
columns.description: Namespace where the pod is running in the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: Node
columns.description: Host name of the Baremetal Machine.

columns.name: PodName
columns.description: Pod name generating the log in the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ComponentName
columns.description: Name of the defender component managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ComponentVersion
columns.description: Version of the defender component managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: Message
columns.description: Syslog message generated by the Baremetal machine.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Severity of the log record. E.g. Info, Warning, Critical, Error, Notice, Debug.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Location of the Nexus Baremetal machine.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: Type of defender log E.g. Trace, Heartbeat.

columns.name: ClusterManagerName
columns.description: Name of the ClusterManager managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of the on-prem Nexus cluster.

tables.description: Security log events on Nexus Baremetal Machines to monitor and detect user access to the system.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.

columns.name: Node
columns.description: Host name of the Baremetal Machine.

columns.name: Mode
columns.description: Mode of the operation by the user.

columns.name: ProcessId
columns.description: ID of the process emitting the log.

columns.name: User
columns.description: User accessing the system.

columns.name: Message
columns.description: The message parsed from the log on user access.

columns.name: Log
columns.description: The log message generated by the system during user access.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Location of the Nexus Baremetal machine.

columns.name: ClusterManagerName
columns.description: Name of the ClusterManager managing the Nexus cluster.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of the on-prem Nexus cluster.
